alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Concordia and northeastern Catahoula Parishes through 300 PM CDT... At 221 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrisonburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sicily Island around 255 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
